about_the_game:
Embark on an exhilarating new chapter in the interstellar saga with "Mythos," the bonus DLC for Avalanca! Immerse yourself in the cosmic tale of the enigmatic Odonis Orphane, the alien force that captivated players in the heart-pounding world of Avalanca.

🌌 Unravel the Alien Enigma:
Dive deep into Odonis Orphane's mysterious origins as the DLC peels back the layers of its enigmatic presence in the Avalanca universe. Uncover the truth behind its otherworldly powers, forging a connection between player and protagonist that transcends the boundaries of the cosmos.

🔫 New Weapons, New Threats:
Gear up for an enhanced arsenal with Mythos, introducing cutting-edge weaponry to counter the evolving challenges posed by Odonis Orphane's alien forces. Face off against advanced enemy units and utilize innovative firepower to overcome the ever-shifting tides of extraterrestrial warfare.

🚀 Expanded Galactic Campaign:
Embark on an extended galactic odyssey with Mythos, featuring additional missions, intense firefights, and mind-bending environments. Traverse uncharted territories, discover hidden secrets, and confront the alien menace in epic battles that will test your combat prowess and strategic acumen.

🌠 Unlock Alien Powers:
Delve into the heart of Odonis Orphane's unique abilities and unlock new alien powers for your character. Harness the forces that have fueled the alien onslaught, turning them against your foes and gaining the upper hand in the ongoing battle for the galaxy.

🌐 Cosmic Customization:
Express your individuality with a wealth of new customization options. Personalize your character with unique alien-themed skins, emotes, and more, showcasing your allegiance to the extraterrestrial narrative that unfolds in the Mythos DLC.

🎮 Enhanced Co-op and Multiplayer Modes:
Join forces with friends or engage in intense multiplayer battles with the enhanced cooperative and competitive modes introduced in Mythos. Team up to face the challenges of the alien onslaught, or compete against other players in dynamic, extraterrestrial arenas.

Uncover the untold story, master advanced weaponry, and face the alien force head-on in Mythos - the bonus DLC that expands the Avalanca experience into uncharted territories. Are you ready to embrace the unknown and rewrite the fate of the galaxy? The stars await your command.

name: Avalanca - Mythos
short_description: Explore the mysteries of Odonis Orphane in the bonus DLC for Avalanca. Equip cutting-edge weaponry, face new alien threats, and unlock extraterrestrial powers. The cosmos awaits – are you ready for the alien odyssey?
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Indonesian*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
*languages with full audio support
